synonyms: rāmānanda-rāya—Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya; kṛṣṇa-rasera—of the transcendental mellow of Kṛṣṇa's devotional service; nidhāna—the mine; teṅha—he; jānāilā—has given instruction; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; svayam—Himself; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
translation: "Śrīla Rāmānanda Rāya is the ultimate knower of the transcendental mellows of Lord Kṛṣṇa's devotional service. He has instructed Me that Lord Kṛṣṇa is the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
